mentionedBy.name: Twilio Inc.

mentionedBy.name: Twilio Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Stockholm-based global CPaaS provider that acquired MessageMedia and Inteliquent. Offers WhatsApp templates, RCS, and Number Masking. Known for per-message pricing that often undercuts Twilio by double-digit percentages, especially for companies handling millions of verification codes daily.
